aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.name: I'm Ibrahim
aboutMe.body: I hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science with a strong background in mobile and web development, specializing in the React ecosystem. With professional experience in developing and enhancing mobile applications, I have applied my knowledge in several projects and contributed to building reliable software solutions. Throughout my academic and professional journey, I have earned various certifications and completed industry-relevant courses to expand my skill set and stay updated with the latest technologies. I am passionate about learning new technologies, contributing to innovative projects, and making a meaningful impact in the world of software development.
